column4: Intel further extends Mobileye offer to mop up outstanding stock
column5: FRANKFURT Computer chip maker Intel Corp  has further extended its offer to buy out remaining shareholders of Mobileye NV  after securing 84 percent of the acquisition target's shares  the two companies said on Tuesday.

column4: U.S. to review Qualcomm's complaints about Apple iPhone patents
column5: WASHINGTON/SAN FRANCISCO U.S. trade officials have agreed to investigate Qualcomm Inc's allegations that Apple Inc infringed on patents with its iPhone 7 and other devices  the U.S. International Trade Commission said on Tuesday.

column4: BRIEF-U.S. International Trade Commission to pursue investigation of Apple
